author: mariohavel
content:
The applications for Cohort 4 are now opened! 

The application and repository for EPF cohort four was released. You have time to apply till June 16 with the actual cohort starting during July. 

I am looking forward to dive with you again into the depths of various domains in Ethereum protocol! Meanwhile you can check out new mentors, project ideas and start to brainstorm ways to contribute. We are excited to see your applications and new project proposals.
https://blog.ethereum.org/2023/06/01/ethereum-protocol-fellowship-fourth-apps-open

author: chirag_bgh
content: do we also need to submit the project proposals?

author: joshd4078
content: No need to submit a full project proposal, but it is a good to have an idea of what you will be interested in working on
